title: Transfiguration
brief_description: Summary; A woman lying in bed thinking of her own existence and fulfilment of her life, experiences fusion of these elements in a transfiguration of thought. The images are cut in varying lengths based on part of the First Movement of Bruckner’s 9th Symphony.
